my_favourite_bni_story: When I first joined BNI, I thought it would be just another networking platform. But what I found was a powerful community that believed in trust, support, and growth. A fellow BNI member once referred me to a startup looking for a brand film. What started as one shoot turned into a long-term creative partnership – covering product videos, social media reels, and even team profiles. That single referral didn’t just bring business, it built a bond rooted in professionalism and mutual success. Through BNI, I’ve connected with people who don’t just promote my work, they believe in it. It’s more than referrals – it’s about being part of a team that cheers you on, even when you’re behind the camera. Proud to be the visual storyteller for a network that’s full of stories worth telling. Phovix Film and Photo is growing – frame by frame – thanks to the power of BNI. #BNIJourney #PhovixFilmAndPhoto #PowerOfNetworking #StoryThroughReferrals #BusinessGrowthThroughBNI

name: Bhanu Chander
company_address: Ashoka Plaza, H.no: 306, Saifabad Rd, Ambedkar Nagar, Masab Tank, Ambedkar Nagar, Masab Tank, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500004
my_business: AGENZY – Your Performance-Driven Growth Partner
top_product: 1. Lead generation services that are atleast 2.3x ROAS(Return-On-Ad-Spend) 2. Creative marketing campaigns 3. Ad commercials & Stunning video editing as per social media trends
ideal_referral: 1. Founders & Decision makers of companies who are looking for Lead generation services. 2. FMCG Brand owners 3. Fashion Brand owners 4. F&B Brand owners
top_problem_solved: 1. Lead Generation Services (2.3X+ ROAS Guaranteed) Problem Solved: Most brands run ads that look good but don’t convert. They burn through budgets without a funnel, offer, or targeting strategy that actually brings results. What we Did: * Star Homeopathy struggled to get qualified leads despite being a reputed hospital. We crafted high-converting ad funnels, drove 7,447 leads, and helped them hit their first ₹1 Cr revenue in under 5 months. * For Provident Kenworth Real Estate, we turned a ₹4.5L ad spend into ₹2.5 Cr in revenue — that’s 55X ROAS in just 3 months. * With Paahi Productions, a fresh media house, we built a funnel from scratch and scaled them to ₹13L/month revenue in 2 months. We solve: Wasted Ad Spend, Poor ROI, and Zero Strategy. 2. Creative Marketing Campaigns That Make Noise Problem Solved: Most businesses struggle with brand recall and engagement because they either copy trends blindly or lack original storytelling that resonates with their audience. What AGENZY Did: * TiE Global Summit (TGS100): We onboarded 550+ startups using bold, entrepreneur-first creatives and messaging that cut through the noise. * Happi Mobiles: Generated 3M+ organic reach through viral UGC contests and influencer strategy, making the brand go viral without burning ad budgets. *Gowri Signatures: We built a storytelling-led campaign for a premium wedding brand and gained 80K+ followers in 6 months, turning a local brand into a global conversation. We solve: Dull branding, inconsistent engagement, and missed virality. 3. Ad Commercials & Social-First Video Editing Problem Solved: Brands often fail to adapt their content to evolving Instagram, YouTube & Reels formats, resulting in low reach and poor watch-time. The storytelling doesn't match the scroll behavior. ✅ What AGENZY Did: * Shot and edited social-first reels for multiple fashion and wellness brands that matched current trends (fast cuts, transitions, voiceovers, effects).
my_favourite_bni_story: My Favourite BNI Story – A 1-Month Win That Aligned With My Dreams I’ve only been a part of BNI for a month — but it’s already giving me what I’ve been chasing for years: the right connections in the right industries. As someone who’s always been passionate about medical and pharma marketing, I knew breaking into that space would take the right door opening at the right time. And that door… was Dr. Fairy. From our very first conversation, she not only understood what I do at AGENZY — but also believed in it. She promised to connect me with top hospitals and key decision-makers. That moment wasn’t just a referral. It was a green light into a whole new industry I’ve always wanted to serve. That’s the power of BNI — one conversation can align with your long-term vision. This might just be the start, but it’s already my favorite BNI moment so far. And I can’t wait to share bigger wins from here on.

ideal_referral: 1. Interior Designers & Architects They constantly need custom MS, brass, or bright steel fabrications like partitions, decorative grills, or furniture frameworks. Ideal for brass partitions, luxury elements, concealed storage. 2. Civil & Turnkey Contractors Handle commercial buildings, educational institutions, hospitals, retail and office fit-outs. Need utility racks, file cabinets, lab tables, kiosks. 3. IT Infrastructure & Networking Vendors Supply data centers, control rooms, and offices. Need custom server racks, enclosures, cable trays, etc. 4. Electrical, Solar & EV Solution Providers Require weather-proof custom enclosures, battery cabinets, inverter housing, etc. Often outsource metalwork for box panels, control boards, and cabinets. 5. Facility Managers & Procurement Heads In schools, hospitals, warehouses, coworking spaces, or corporates. Regularly purchase storage solutions, cabinets, racks, lab furniture. 6. Startup Founders in Energy / EV / IoT Require product enclosures, display units, prototypes in metal. Need low-volume custom fabrication with fast turnarounds.
top_problem_solved: Top Problems Kalina Solves 1. ❌ Off-the-shelf enclosures don’t fit real-world applications ✅ We fabricate custom enclosures tailored to your dimensions, component layout, and usage environment. 2. ❌ Long lead times from standard manufacturers ✅ With in-house fabrication and powder coating, we deliver faster — often within 2–7 days for repeatable formats. 3. ❌ Poor finish or inconsistent fabrication quality ✅ Our team ensures high-precision cutting, welding, grinding, and finishing, so the final product looks and performs flawlessly. 4. ❌ Lack of design collaboration or customization ✅ We support architects, engineers, and designers with co-creation — offering samples, drawings, and prototyping support. 5. ❌ Subcontractors can’t handle both utility and aesthetics ✅ Kalina bridges utility + design — from technical enclosures to beautiful brass partitions and powder-coated fixtures. 6. ❌ Difficulty sourcing metal furniture for labs, hospitals, or institutions ✅ We custom-fabricate lab tables, server desks, exam desks, hospital beds, and storage systems designed for heavy use. 7. ❌ Unreliable vendors who miss project timelines ✅ Kalina’s track record with corporate clients and contractors ensures on-time delivery, even for complex or bulk orders. 8. ❌ No single vendor for cutting, bending, welding, coating ✅ We provide a complete in-house solution — laser cutting, CNC bending, powder coating, and assembly — under one roof. 9. ❌ Interior designers struggle with executing metal elements ✅ We bring their ideas to life: brass racks, partitions, custom grillwork, lighting frames — delivered exactly as visualized. 10. ❌ Energy & EV companies lack enclosure partners for product launch ✅ We fabricate EV charging cabinets, BMS enclosures, inverter panels, and solar housings to accelerate go-to-market. 11. ❌ Storage systems don’t match space requirements ✅ Slotted angle racks, custom lockers, file cabinets, and shelving are fabricated in custom sizes to maximize space u
my_favourite_bni_story: My Favorite BNI Story: From Profile to Partnership One of my favorite BNI stories started with nothing more than visibility. A few months ago, Dinesh Naidu from BNI Mumbai came across my BNI Connect profile, noticed our work in custom sheet metal fabrication, and reached out. He was looking for a reliable partner to fabricate over 400 ATM kiosks for a railway infrastructure project being deployed across stations in Kerala. What began as a conversation turned into a full-scale collaboration. We’re now fabricating and delivering high-precision ATM kiosks, tailor-made for rugged use and smart integration — all thanks to the power of the BNI network. This is the kind of referral that reminds me why BNI works: visibility leads to credibility, and credibility leads to opportunity. Kalina — where connections turn into creations.

top_problem_solved: Helping corporates and individuals shift from generic, unhealthy beverage options to customized, wellness-focused tea and coffee solutions—whether it’s curating thoughtful gifting hampers, setting up corporate pantry menus, or elevating café experiences with healthier, flavorful brews that people actually look forward to. A corporate client once reached out just days before their annual employee appreciation event—with no plan, no theme, and over 250 employees to cater to. We not only designed and delivered customized wellness tea and coffee hampers that aligned with their brand values, but also set up a live tasting experience that became the highlight of the event. It turned a stressful situation into a memorable, engaging experience—proving that with the right brew, anything is possible.
my_favourite_bni_story: I once received a referral for a small tea-tasting session through a fellow member, which unexpectedly turned into a corporate order for 250+ employees across multiple locations. That one connection not only brought in great business but also built lasting trust and opened doors to new verticals I hadn’t imagined. It reminded me that in BNI, even the smallest referral can brew something big!
